hero.headline: Home Comfort
hero.description: Licensed HVAC technicians serving {{city}} with expert heating and cooling solutions. From AC repair to furnace installation, {{businessName}} keeps your home comfortable year-round.

items.label: EPA Compliant
items.value: EPA-certified refrigerant handling for safe, legal service.

items.label: Upfront Pricing
items.value: Know the cost before any work begins — no surprises.

items.label: Same-Day Service
items.value: Fast response when your comfort can't wait.

processSection.headline: How It Works
processSection.description: Getting professional HVAC service in {{city}} is easy.

steps.title: Call or Book Online
steps.description: Tell us about your heating or cooling issue. We respond quickly.

steps.title: Diagnostic Visit
steps.description: A certified technician inspects your system and explains your options.

steps.title: Expert Repair
steps.description: We fix it right the first time with upfront pricing and quality parts.

steps.title: Comfort Restored
steps.description: Enjoy reliable heating and cooling backed by our {{warrantyYears}}-year warranty.

aboutSection.description: {{businessName}} has been serving {{city}} and the {{region}} since {{establishedYear}}. With {{reviewCount}}+ five-star reviews and a team of NATE-certified professionals, we deliver heating and cooling services you can count on. Our commitment to quality workmanship, honest pricing, and exceptional customer service has made us one of {{city}}'s most trusted HVAC companies.
aboutSection.mission: To keep {{city}} homes comfortable year-round with honest, reliable heating and cooling services.

values.title: Certified Expertise
values.description: NATE-certified technicians who stay current on the latest HVAC technology.

values.title: Honest Pricing
values.description: Upfront quotes with no hidden fees or surprise charges.

values.title: Customer Comfort
values.description: Your comfort and satisfaction are our top priority, backed by our guarantee.
